From: Robin Kirkman <robin@...>

::VorbIss::

"My name is VorbIss. I'm new around here, and I'm not liking it. Frankly, I 
don't trust you. I don't know who you are, where you came from, or why you're 
there. I just made a call to potential allies, and I think you're a potential 
kidnapper."

VorbIss trained his taser on Fractyl's left eye. "I may not be powerfull, but 
I've got enough juice in me to wipe you out. Understood? No sudden moves."

With that, VorbIss visibly relaxed somewhat. "Now that I'm done ensuring my 
safety, I believe you were introducing yourself?"

On Thursday 23 August 2001 03:03, Yanshosh@... wrote:
> ::Shuttle/Fractyl::
>
> The shuttle's hatch opens, ready to close again and lift off whenever.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Fractyl looks up sharply, hearing a voice and then seeing a shuttle. His
> vision wasn't all that great in his damaged state, though, so he couldn't
> make out details.
>
> "Explain? What in the pit's there to explain?" Fractyl says in an annoyed
> voice, "I just got blasted by that slagging base back there, just woke up.
> Who in the pit are you?"
